data.name: Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen - Uruuru & Saraana
data.detailed_description:
Unlocks the following character for use in battle in Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen:
  • Uruuru & Saraana
data.about_the_game:
Unlocks the following character for use in battle in Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen:

data.short_description: Unlock Uruuru & Saraana for use in battle in Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen!

English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
